description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is circling back to include its roster of Netflix shows as part of the main canon. This will begin with Daredevil: Born Again, a successor to the hit series Daredevil, and it looks like fans can expect some other familiar faces to appear. This has been seemingly confirmed in what appears [...]

The post First Look At Jon Bernthal’s Punisher Return In ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Revealed appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: First Look At Jon Bernthal’s Punisher Return In ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Revealed

description:
Sam Raimi has been linked to Marvel and the MCU since the early 2000s, with films like the Spider-Man trilogy and, most recently, Doctor Strange and the Multiverse of Madness. Fans of Raimi have been waiting and hoping that the director might return to working with Marvel Studios on one of the long-developing projects. Some [...]

The post Exclusive: Sam Raimi Says He Wants To Direct ‘Avengers: Secret Wars’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Exclusive: Sam Raimi Says He Wants To Direct ‘Avengers: Secret Wars’
